title: Outbound Add a Table or View to Share
test_description: Validates adding tables or views to Delta Sharing shares by adding data assets to an existing share
manual_procedure: In the "Add data assets" section, search and select a table you'd like to have as part of the data share.

api_calls.name: check_delta_sharing_enabled
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const status = responseData?.status?.state || 'UNKNOWN'; const success = status === 'SUCCEEDED'; const dataArray = responseData?.result?.data_array || []; const hasRecipients = dataArray && dataArray.length > 0; const error = responseData?.status?.error?.message || ''; const isDeltaSharingDisabled = error.includes('External Delta Sharing is not enabled'); return { ...currentVariables, delta_sharing_available: success, has_recipients: hasRecipients, recipient_count: dataArray.length, delta_sharing_disabled: isDeltaSharingDisabled }; }

api_calls.name: check_share_exists
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const dataArray = responseData?.result?.data_array || []; const testShareExists = dataArray.some(row => row[0] === 'test_data_share_' + (currentVariables.catalog_name || 'catalog')); const shareCount = dataArray.length; return { ...currentVariables, test_share_exists: testShareExists, total_share_count: shareCount }; }

api_calls.name: add_table_to_share

payload.statement: ALTER SHARE test_data_share_${catalog_name} ADD TABLE ${catalog_name}.default.test WITH HISTORY

api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const status = responseData?.status?.state || 'UNKNOWN'; const success = status === 'SUCCEEDED'; const statementId = responseData?.statement_id || ''; const error = responseData?.status?.error?.message || ''; const errorCode = responseData?.status?.error?.error_code || ''; const isAlreadyExists = error.includes('already exists') || error.includes('RESOURCE_ALREADY_EXISTS'); const isSuccess = success || isAlreadyExists; return { ...currentVariables, table_added: isSuccess, add_status: status, add_statement_id: statementId, add_error: error, table_already_exists: isAlreadyExists, add_error_code: errorCode }; }

api_calls.name: verify_share_contents
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const dataArray = responseData?.result?.data_array || []; const hasObjects = dataArray && dataArray.length > 0; const objectCount = hasObjects ? dataArray.length : 0; const objectNames = hasObjects ? dataArray.map(row => row[0] || 'Unknown').join(', ') : ''; const targetTableExists = dataArray.some(row => row[0] === 'test'); return { ...currentVariables, has_objects: hasObjects, object_count: objectCount, object_names: objectNames, target_table_exists: targetTableExists }; }

parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const checkStep = stepResults.check_delta_sharing_enabled; const checkShareStep = stepResults.check_share_exists; const addTableStep = stepResults.add_table_to_share; const verifyStep = stepResults.verify_share_contents; const expected_result = 'Succeeded'; let actual_result = 'Delta Sharing table addition failed'; const deltaSharingAvailable = variables.delta_sharing_available || false; const deltaSharingDisabled = variables.delta_sharing_disabled || false; if (!deltaSharingAvailable || deltaSharingDisabled) { actual_result = 'Delta Sharing is not enabled on this workspace. Contact account admin to enable External Delta Sharing on the metastore.'; return { status: 'fail', message: 'Delta Sharing functionality not available', code: 'DELTA_SHARING_NOT_ENABLED', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } const testShareExists = variables.test_share_exists || false; if (!testShareExists) { actual_result = 'Test share does not exist - cannot add table'; return { status: 'fail', message: actual_result, code: 'SHARE_NOT_FOUND', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } if (addTableStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to add table to share', code: 'TABLE_ADDITION_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } const tableAdded = variables.table_added || false; const tableAlreadyExists = variables.table_already_exists || false; const addStatus = variables.add_status || 'UNKNOWN'; const addError = variables.add_error || ''; if (!tableAdded && !tableAlreadyExists) { actual_result = `Table addition failed with status: ${addStatus}`; if (addError) { actual_result += ` - ${addError}`; } return { status: 'fail', message: actual_result, code: 'TABLE_ADDITION_FAILED', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } const hasObjects = variables.has_objects || false; const objectCount = variables.object_count || 0; const targetTableExists = variables.target_table_exists || false; if (tableAlreadyExists) { actual_result = 'Table already exists in share - operation successful'; return { status: 'pass', message: 'Table already exists in Delta Sharing share - no action needed', code: 'TABLE_ALREADY_EXISTS', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } else if (hasObjects && targetTableExists) { actual_result = 'Succeeded'; return { status: 'pass', message: 'Table successfully added to Delta Sharing share', code: 'TABLE_ADDITION_SUCCESS', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } else if (hasObjects) { actual_result = 'Table added but target table not found in share contents'; return { status: 'fail', message: actual_result, code: 'TARGET_TABLE_NOT_IN_SHARE', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { actual_result = 'Table added but no objects found in share'; return { status: 'fail', message: actual_result, code: 'NO_OBJECTS_IN_SHARE', test_id: 'OQ-112-2', title: 'Outbound Add a Table or View to Share', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
